  • C API reference

C API referenceðŸ”—

The core data types used by the VisionAppster runtime are defined using the C programming language. Fixed width integer types, double and float are used as primitive data types. In addition, a few primitive-like types are defined as typedefs. There is also a number of complex data types, the most important of which are:

  • Image

  • Matrix

  • Tensor

  • String

  • Object

  • Array
